title: Ball O' Fuse Wire
summaries: The Ball O' Fuse Wire is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a pet Dynamite Kitten resembling the Orange Tabby variant of the Town Cat to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Kitten will ride towards them on a stick of Dynamite and immediately dismount when it is on solid ground. The Ball O' Fuse Wire can be purchased from the Zoologist for 50 GC after completing 70% (378 entries) of the Bestiary.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a dynamite kitten
'It's like yarn, but more exciting!'
statistics.Buy: 50 GC
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
